title: OpCo's Gheit on OPEC: Lower Oil Prices Are Here To Stay (Audio)
itunes:title: OpCo's Gheit on OPEC: Lower Oil Prices Are Here To Stay (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Fadel Gheit, Senior Analyst at Oppenheimer & Co, for a look at oil prices, and the impact of Iran and Saudi Arabia's opposing views on an output freeze.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
